lines.text: You're a funny man Mr. Taylor... but I've met funnier.
When the wheel of fortune spins, an ancient game of chance begins, but who could know or guess the rules, adrift upon the ship of fools.
I know fuck-all about art, but I know what I like.

[finds a porno mag]
Sorted. I'm off for a toss, me.
What are YOU doing in my house?
Me just shit in your bed.
You did WHAT?
You no see how the atmosphere nice now?
You dirty cow.
BLIND, is it you think I am?
What?
Do you think I don't know what's been going on behind my back?
There's nothing going on behind your back.
I take the pair of you; day on night, night on day!
I don't know what you're talking about.
I lie awake at night crying. Crying into my pillow.
Yeah? Well, I'm very sorry to hear that.
...and her kids, screaming. Screaming, they are.
Look, alright, I think I get the point.
No, but you don't, see?
But I do.
No, but you don't get the point.
But I do.
No, but you don't get THE point.
Oh, but I do. I get THE point.
Do you?
Yeah.

[relieved]
Yeah?
Oh yes.

[aggressive]
Yeah?
Yeah.

[extinguishes cigarette]
Yeah?
C'mon then.
Big hard man, are you?
Bigger than you.
Calling me short, are you?
Yeah, c'mon then.
You want a bit, do you?
[headbutts him]
Now see, you still don't get the point.
I do.
No, you don't... because I've got the point here.
[picks up a high-heeled shoe]
THIS is the point.
[stabs him in the eye repeatedly with the shoe heel]
Point taken.
